import React from 'react' import MarginalDistanceTop from "../components/MarginalDistanceTop"; import { Col, Row ,Image} from 'react-bootstrap'; const AboutScreen = () => { return ( <>

About Me

Hi, I am Ashish Kumar

I have just over a year of experience as a Web Developer with "ReactJs" Technology who constantly seeks out innovative solutions to everyday problems with my analytical thinking and collaboration skills.

Project Description: This is Ecommerce project where user can search the product, view the product, filter the product category , add product to the cart and checkout the product as well In view product page user can give the rating to the product and after checkout the product there are four steps to complete the order 1) SignIn 2) Address 3) Payment 4)PlaceOrder

Technology used in Project:
FrontEnd: Reactjs, Redux, BootStrap, CSS3 and HTML5
RestApi's used in FrontEnd: ReactHelmet, ReduxThunk , ReactRouterBootstrap, ReactBootstrap, React PaypalButton v2
BackEnd : ExpressJs,NodeJs and MongoDB cloud cluster
RestApi's used in Backend: DotEnv, JsonWebToken, Morgan, Multer, Concurrently, Nodemon, Mongoose, ExpressAsyncHandler, Bcryptjs

Social Media Link

Github LinkedIn Twitter Facebook What'sApp
) } export default AboutScreen
